scripts.postinstall: bash -c 'cp node_modules/ai/dist/index.mjs node_modules/ai/dist/index.stock.mjs && cp node_modules/@anthropic-ai/sdk/lib/MessageStream.mjs node_modules/@anthropic-ai/sdk/lib/MessageStream.stock.mjs && cp "node_modules/@tanstack/ai/dist/esm/activities/chat/stream/processor.js" "node_modules/@tanstack/ai/dist/esm/activities/chat/stream/processor.stock.js" && for p in patches/*.patch; do patch -p0 -N < "$p" || true; done'
